description: Number of compositions of n into nonprime numbers.
comments: Starting with offset 1, appears to be row sums of triangle A157424 [From _Gary W. Adamson_ & _Mats Granvik_, Feb 28 2009]
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..500
mathematica: nn=50; np=Select[Range[nn], !PrimeQ[ # ] &]; CoefficientList[Series[1/(1-Sum[x^k, {k, np}]), {x, 0, nn}], x] [From _T. D. Noe_, Aug 20 2010]
crossrefs: Cf. A002095 (Number of partitions of n into nonprime parts).
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 16 2002
extensions: Definition and g.f. corrected by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 19 2010, who thanks _Vladimir Kruchinin_ for pointing out the errors.
